dialogue.string: 1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Crucible(pt.1).The Crucible(pt.2).The Crucible(pt.3).The Crucible(pt.4).Unshakable Nightmares.The Lifestream of Reisenjima(pt.1).The Lifestream of Reisenjima(pt.2).Way to Divinity(pt.1).Way to Divinity(pt.2).The Winds of Time.Nary a Cloud in Sight.Guardians.Absolute Trust.The Orb's Radiance(pt.1).The Orb's Radiance(pt.2).A Rhapsody for the Ages.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
?!�Which battlefield will you enter?None.The Orb's Radiance.Letter from Iroha. (CL: 119)Letter from Reisenjima.

1�Enter the battlefield?Enter.Decline.
1�Leave the battlefield?Run away.Stay.
1�Head outside?Yes.No.
1�How do you respond?It's not your fault.Why would I blame you?I'm not sure I understand.
1�How do you react?Are you well?Don't strain yourself!Does this mean you're back with us?
1�Are you destined for godhood?I'll do what must be done.I'm not cut out for it.
1�Thou hast once before been called a ?[god/goddess].
1�Yet thy power hath been lost, and in that we are closer than thou might think.
1�Canst thou not hear it? Altana is calling out to her children.
1�Come to the stone circle in La Theine.
1�Master, as you have doubtlessly realized, this is the crystal that Selh'teus relinquished his corporeal form to create.
1�Though the crystal may still be young, its light shines as brightly as any other.
1�The Emptiness that remains in the Far East in the future will be banished thanks to this beacon of hope.
1�The Emptiness that had been eating away at the Far East will be banished thanks to this beacon of hope.
1�But despite this, the coming darkness will not be stopped.
1�Ere long, a murky gloom will seep forth from mothercrystals throughout Vana'diel--a corrosive force destroying them from within.
1�This crystal--and this crystal alone--remained safe thanks to you, Master, and your allies.
1�My prayers were answered, erecting an ethereal shield to shelter this area from harm.
1�And as such, Reisenjima remained the only land that the void did not overcome.
1�And the night before the final struggle was to take place...
1�...you made an impossible decision.
1�??Every victory comes with a price.??
1�Master, those were the words you spoke to me.
1�For all the light you have worked to gather, is it possible that another is gathering umbral puissance?
1�That is why I was permitted to cross the boundaries of time and come to you.
1�Yet my greatest anguish was how utterly powerless I was.
1�Master, all your sacrifices were made to save me.
1�The void consumed all...except Reisenjima and myself.
1�You sacrificed yourself to save me...and me alone.
1�Master, your words of compassion have moved me yet again. I promise to atone for all I have--or will have--put you through.
1�If the only way to prevent you from succumbing to darkness is by filling the orb with light, then that is what we shall do. Not just for you, but to reclaim all you may have sacrificed.
1�Though this does not affect our mission, it does bring a greater sense of urgency.
1�Let us head to Adoulin, one of the many places you described to me.
1�My understanding is that there are transit devices in Jeuno which can take us to the western continent.
1�The Jeuno Chamber of Commerce and Industry is looking for people to become pioneers and colonize the Ulbukan hinterlands.
1�Ah, but you have been there already?
1�Let us make haste. I shall meet you on the archipelago.
1�I must take a short while to recover. Please, go on ahead.
1�...No. I cannot say that I am whole yet.
1�Your concern touches me more than words can express.
1�Please forgive me, for I am not yet whole.
1�...No. I still wander the realm of the dead.
1�Please forgive me for not being there for you in full.
1�Is...is such a thing possible? For a ?[man to become a god/woman to become a goddess]?
1�There were two Masters...
1�Now that my head is clear, I wonder if the voice calling me back here was your own.
1�??The Reckoning must be altered.??
1�You became a ?[god/goddess] of light, and journeyed to a place I could not reach.
1�Perhaps it was then you realized I still existed, and sent me back in an attempt to change what would come to pass.
1�Whether Master did or did not meet Her then, ?[he/she] must do so now.
1�Lord Selh'teus, is there naught you can share with us about this?
1�You see, in creating this crystal, Selh'teus inadvertently caused the greater half of the sanctorium to collapse.
1�This had the unfortunate side effect of destabilizing the lifestream in this area, preventing the crystal from achieving its maximum potential.
1�I would offer my prayers at this location, but the taint of foul beasts stops me from doing even that.
e!�Master! Vanquishing the panopts proved to be the key in restoring order to the lifestream coursing through Reisenjima.
1�Never would anyone have thought it possible to meet the Goddess herself...
1�Master, I pray for your success!
1�And how I longed to gaze upon a peaceful world with you...
1�We cannot let this continue...but if the crystal shatters...
1�All we can do...is ensure that the darkness spreads no further...
1�That must be it--the Cloud of Darkness!
1�The corrosive force is eating at the crystal from inside!
1�Phoenix's power reached its zenith thanks to all you have done.
1�Master!!!
1�I am so pleased that you found your way back to me.
1�Far be it from me to remind you of how worried she was about you.
1�And Iroha herself resides within this one.
1�Together with her is the same force that has brought her back countless times... Phoenix.
1�Nor have I. Lady Yve'noile's wisdom stretches eons beyond ours.
1�Then the only path left for you is to use the power of this crystal.
1�Which requires us to break it.
1� , a swell of darkness clouds your mind and spirit.
1� , the crystal has allowed me to see all that you have seen.
1�Though I know not how, through some means you were able to cast off your inner darkness.
1�Yet not even that was sufficient to quell the Cloud of Darkness.
1�You only succeeded in halting its ingress.
1�And Iroha...Iroha could only sit by and watch the world dissipate around her.
1�And when you became this ?[god/goddess] of light...did you meet Altana?
1�It is as Yve'noile alluded to--Altana is located in a higher plane of existence.
1�Now that I have turned into a crystal, it may be possible for me to commune with her...but...
1�Nothing good will come if we sit here wringing our hands. The proper course of action is to try.
1�You must head to the seat of the Zilart's power...the Empyreal Paradox.
1�That is the closest place to Altana's domain that any mortal can presently reach.
1�It is a place of legends, where only those who pass through the crystals are able to reach.
1�I shall unbar the path for you.
1�However, I require your aid to reach Al'Taieu from this crystal.
1�In particular, one-eyed monsters known as panopts despoil the lifestream, preventing Iroha's words from reaching it.
1�Though I would be asking too much of you to fully cull the threat, even a temporary reprieve would buy us the time we so desperately need.
1�My understanding is that some of your allies have freshly arrived on Reisenjima.
1�I beseech you to seek out their aid in this endeavor.
1�Once at Al'Taieu, you will doubtless be able to meet with the Goddess...and your darkened self.
1�What happens after is for you to decide.
1� , I am now able to manipulate the crystal to its fullest.
1�And as such, it is now possible for me to see you off on your path to meet the Goddess.
1�And the god of darkness--your other half--awaits you as well.
1�Are your preparations complete?
1�No need for haste. I shall be here whenever you are ready.
1�Are your preparations complete?
1�No need for haste. I shall be here whenever you are ready.
1�The hopes of millions rest upon your wings.
1�Let the crystal guide us to a brighter future.
1�Then I shall open the path once more.
1�I failed,  .
1�I knew that none could stop the Cloud of Darkness, and yet...
1�I tried. I tried to save her.
1�Phoenix!
s!�When you left, ominous shadows appeared, swirling around the center of the crystal.
1�Lady Iroha!
1�How is such a thing possible!? We had thought it banished!
1�We cannot sit on our hands and let it regain full strength! I need not remind you what that means for our future!
-!�Did she mean...did she mean that we must shatter the crystal to stem the tide?
1�No. That is not the proper course.
1�Lord Selh'teus gave up his personhood to call forth this crystal.
1�In so doing, he prevented the Emptiness from encroaching upon my homeland any further.
1�Destroying the crystal would make a mockery of his sacrifice...and also spell the doom of my people.
1�And Iroha...
1�Does she not reside within this crystal as well!?
1�?[Lord/Lady]  , would it be possible to traverse the crystal once more?
1�Ah, I understand. The last time you were successful only because you had gained a small essence of divinity.
1�Divinity which was likely lost when you clashed with your dark self.
1�Then perhaps you must gather such power once more.
1�Phoenix, your words of wisdom mean much in these dark times.
1�?[Lord/Lady]  , the Goddess and the avatar may see fit to lend their aid.
1�We must make haste for the stone circle in La Theine Plateau!
1�Truly a tale for th' ages!
